content: Check users from the list to import into {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. Only users with emails can be selected. Users already existing in {{organizationName}} {{productName}} are highlighted with a green color and are not checked by default.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip or message that describes the selection process for importing users into Nextcloud, emphasizing the requirement for email addresses and highlighting existing users. It appears in a data import step of a portal settings page, guiding translators to focus on emails and distinguish between new and existing users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لاستيرادها" (li-istīrāduhā) implies importing 'them' (the users) which is slightly awkward. It would be more natural to say 'إلى' (ila) which means 'to'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تحقق من المستخدمين من القائمة لاستيرادهم إلى {{organizationName}} {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "يتم تمييز" (yutammiyz) is grammatically correct but sounds slightly formal and passive. A more natural phrasing could be "يظهر" (yadhhar) meaning 'appear' or 'are shown'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يظهر المستخدمين الموجودين بالفعل في {{organizationName}} {{productName}} بلون أخضر.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ولا يتم التحقق منهم بشكل افتراضي' ('wa lā yutam al-taḥaqquq minhum bi-shakl iftiradiy) is a bit verbose and could be simplified. A better way to express 'not checked by default' would be 'غير محددة افتراضياً' ('ghair muhaddada iftiradiy').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يظهر المستخدمين الموجودين بالفعل في {{organizationName}} {{productName}} بلون أخضر وغير محددة افتراضياً.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "defolt olaraq qeyd olunmur" is an awkward translation of "not checked by default." A more natural phrasing would be something like "varsayılan olaraq seçilmiş deyil" or "otomatik olaraq seçilməyib".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: varsayılan olaraq seçilmiş deyil

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The consistency of the placeholders "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}" should be checked across all translations. While technically correct, the repetition could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using variables or more concise placeholders if possible, depending on the overall UI/UX design.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'входирате' is not the most natural way to express 'import' in this context. It sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Внесете

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'маркирани' might be too formal. A more conversational word could improve the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: оцветени

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses "aplikace" before {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. While technically correct, it might be more natural to omit it or use a different phrasing depending on the overall tone of the UI. Consider if the product name already implies it's an application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing "aplikace" or replacing it with a more natural phrasing (e.g., "pro {{organizationName}} {{productName}}").

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses 'highlighted', the Czech 'zvýrazněni'. While not incorrect, a slightly more natural phrasing for a UI element might be 'označeni' or 'viditelní'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'zvýrazněni' with 'označeni' or 'viditelní' for better readability in a UI context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'standardmäßig nicht markiert' is a less natural way to express 'are not checked by default'. A more fluent translation would be 'sind standardmäßig nicht ausgewählt'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: sind standardmäßig nicht ausgewählt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ελέγξτε τους χρήστες από τη λίστα για εισαγωγή στο" is not the most natural way to phrase "Check users from the list to import into". A more natural translation would be something like "Επιλέξτε χρήστες από τη λίστα για εισαγωγή στο".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε χρήστες από τη λίστα για εισαγωγή στο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "στο {{productName}} του {{organizationName}}" is clunky.  It would be more natural to simplify this.  Consider using a single possessive construction, or removing one of the possessives depending on the desired emphasis.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: στο {{organizationName}} {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Marque los usuarios de la lista" is a bit stiff. A more natural phrasing would be "Seleccione los usuarios de la lista". "Marque" implies a checkbox or marking something as completed, while "seleccione" is a more general term for choosing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seleccione los usuarios de la lista

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "no están marcados de forma predeterminada" is grammatically correct but a bit verbose.  A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: no están seleccionados por defecto.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish word for 'green' is 'vihreä', not 'virheällä'. The sentence mentions highlighting users with 'green color'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Valitse {{organizationName}} {{productName}}:n tuotavat käyttäjät listalta. Vain käyttäjät, joilla on sähköposti, voidaan valita. Jo {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-ssa olemassaolevat käyttäjät on korostettu vihreällä värillä ja niitä ei ole oletuksena valittu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ne sont pas cochés par défaut' could be improved for clarity and flow. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les utilisateurs déjà présents dans {{organizationName}} {{productName}} sont mis en évidence en vert et ne sont pas sélectionnés par défaut.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a colon after 'համար' (for). It should probably be removed or replaced with a period depending on the desired flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace ':' with '.' or remove it completely:  'Ստուգեք օգտվողներին ցանկից՝ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ներմուծելու համար. Կարող են ընտրվել միայն էլփոստ ունեցող օգտվողները. {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-ում արդեն գոյություն ունեցող օգտատերերը ընդգծված են կանաչ գույնով և լռելյայն չեն ստուգվում:' becomes 'Ստուգեք օգտվողներին ցանկից `{{organizationName}} {{productName}} ներմուծելու համար։ Կարող են ընտրվել միայն էլփոստ ունեցող օգտվողները։ {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-ում արդեն գոյություն ունեցող օգտատերերը ընդգծված են կանաչ գույնով և լռելյայն չեն ստուգվում:' or 'Ստուգեք օգտվողներին ցանկից {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ներմուծելու համար։ Կարող են ընտրվել միայն էլփոստ ունեցող օգտվողները։ {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-ում արդեն գոյություն ունեցող օգտատերերը ընդգծված են կանաչ գույնով և լռելյայն չեն ստուգվում:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation uses "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}" which replicates the English format.  It might be more natural to rephrase depending on how these variables are meant to be used in context. Consider if it would be better to use something like "{{organizationName}} e {{productName}}" or "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}" (if the space is intentional).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the intended use of the variables and rephrase accordingly. For example: 'in {{organizationName}} e {{productName}}' or 'in {{organizationName}} {{productName}}'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{organizationName}} {{productName}} appears multiple times. It is recommended to use a more consistent formatting or consider separate variables for each part to improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using separate variables like {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} or a combined variable {{organizationNameProduct}} for consistent formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '가져오기할' is awkward and doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'to import'. A more natural phrasing would be '가져올' or '등록할'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 목록에서 {{organizationName}} {{productName}}로 가져올 사용자를 선택하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The conjunction '및' (and) is a bit formal in this context. A more common and natural connector would be '는' or a simple omission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이메일이 있는 사용자만 선택할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຖືກເນັ້ນໃສ່ດ້ວຍສີຂຽວ' sounds slightly awkward. It could be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖືກສະແດງດ້ວຍສີຂຽວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ບໍ່ໄດ້ຖືກກວດສອບຕາມຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' is a bit clunky. 'ບໍ່ຖືກເລືອກໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ' is a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບໍ່ຖືກເລືອກໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The period at the end of the second sentence feels abrupt, as it's immediately followed by the next sentence. Consider adding a conjunction or rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວຢູ່ໃນ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ແລະຈະຖືກເນັ້ນໃສ່ດ້ວຍສີຂຽວ ແລະບໍ່ໄດ້ຖືກເລືອກໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Var atlasīt tikai lietotājus ar e-pasta ziņojumiem" is a literal translation of 'Only users with emails can be selected'. A more natural and accurate Latvian phrasing would be something like "Var atlasīt tikai lietotājus, kuriem ir e-pasta adrese" or "Var atlasīt tikai lietotājus ar derīgu e-pasta adresi".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Var atlasīt tikai lietotājus ar derīgu e-pasta adresi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses "Vink" (check) instead of "Selecteer" (select). While "Vink" is understandable, "Selecteer" would be more consistent with the English term 'Select'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selecteer gebruikers aan uit de lijst om te importeren in {{organizationName}} {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zijn aangegeven met een groene kleur" is grammatically correct but slightly verbose and less natural. A more fluent construction would be "zijn gemarkeerd met een groene kleur" or "worden weergegeven met een groene kleur".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vink gebruikers aan uit de lijst om te importeren in {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. Alleen gebruikers met e-mail kunnen worden geselecteerd. Gebruikers die al bestaan in {{organizationName}} {{productName}} worden weergegeven met een groene kleur en zijn niet standaard aangevinkt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a semicolon (;) at the end of the first sentence instead of a period (.). This is grammatically incorrect in Polish and breaks the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change ';' to '.' at the end of the first sentence: "Wybierz z listy użytkowników, których chcesz zaimportować do {{organizationName}} {{productName}}." becomes "Wybierz z listy użytkowników, których chcesz zaimportować do {{organizationName}} {{productName}}."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'exstenți' is a misspelling of 'existenți'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: existenți

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation uses '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' which might be too literal. Consider a more natural phrasing if context allows, such as combining them into a single name or using a more descriptive term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' to a more natural Russian phrasing, depending on the specific context of the names. For example, 'в системе {{organizationName}}' or 'в {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ලැදිස්තයේ සිටින' (ladisthayē sitina) translates literally to 'being in a list' which doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'from the list'. A more accurate translation would be something like 'ලේඛනයෙන්' (lekhayanēn) which means 'from the document/list'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් ලේඛනයෙන් (parishīlakayin lekhayanēn) වෙතට ආනයනය කිරීමට...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පෙරනිද්දීම පරීක්ෂා කරනු නොලැබේ' (peraniddaīma parīkṣā karanu nolabē) is a rather complex and slightly awkward phrasing. While technically correct, it could be simplified for better readability. It translates to 'are not checked by default'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෙරනිදහසින් තෝරාගත නොවේ (peranidahasa thōrāgata novē) - which translates to 'are not selected by default'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of `{{organizationName}} {{productName}}` is consistent with the English, which is good. However, ensure that the platform using this translation will correctly handle these placeholders. Consistency is key.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, ensure placeholders are handled correctly on the target platform.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Check users from the list" as "Označte v zozname používateľov" is slightly awkward. A more natural translation might be "Vyberte používateľov zo zoznamu" or "Zvoľte používateľov zo zoznamu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vyberte používateľov zo zoznamu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ktoré majú zadaný e-mail' is grammatically correct but less fluent than alternatives. A more natural phrasing would convey the sense of having a valid email address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ktorí majú platnú e-mailovú adresu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "are not checked by default" as "pôvodne nie sú označení" is technically correct, but could be improved for clarity. A more direct translation would be clearer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nie sú predvoliteľne zaškrtnutí

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Check users from the list' is translated as 'Preverite uporabnike s seznama'. While technically correct, 'Preverite uporabnike iz seznama' would be a more natural and common phrasing in Slovenian. 'S seznama' implies users are from multiple lists, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Preverite uporabnike iz seznama

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'are highlighted with a green color' is translated as 'so označeni z zeleno barvo'. A more natural phrasing would be 'so poudarjeni z zeleno barvo' or 'so obarvani zeleno'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: so poudarjeni z zeleno barvo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'are not checked by default' is translated as 'privzeto niso označeni'. While technically correct, a more precise translation would be 'privzeto niso izbrani'. 'Označeni' implies marking, while 'izbrani' reflects the action of selecting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: privzeto niso izbrani

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'email-ovima' should be 'e-mail adresama' for better readability and accuracy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Проверите кориснике са листе које желите да увезете у {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. Само корисници са е-mail адресама ће бити одабрани. Корисници који већ постоје у {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-у су означени зеленом бојом и подразумевано нису означени.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Су означени зеленом бојом и подразумевано нису означени' can be improved for smoother flow. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Проверите кориснике са листе које желите да увезете у {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. Само корисници са е-mail адресама ће бити одабрани. Корисници који већ постоје у {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-у су означени зеленом бојом и нису аутоматски одбрани.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Check users from the list' is translated as 'Proverite korisnike sa liste koje želite da uvezete'. While understandable, 'Proverite korisnike sa liste za uvoz' would be a more direct and natural translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Proverite korisnike sa liste za uvoz

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'are highlighted with a green color' is translated as 'su označeni zelenom bojom'. While technically correct, 'su obeleženi zelenom bojom' or 'ističu zelenom bojom' would be more natural-sounding in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: su obeleženi zelenom bojom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The dash in '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}-u' feels awkward. A space would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses double quotes for the organization and product names, while English uses single quotes for the template variable {{organizationName}} and {{productName}}. This creates a formatting mismatch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change all double quotes to single quotes to match the English template: '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}’

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Будуть вибрані лише користувачі з адресами електронної пошти" is awkward. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of "Лише користувачі з адресами електронної пошти можуть бути вибрані" or "Можна вибрати лише користувачів з адресами електронної пошти".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можна вибрати лише користувачів з адресами електронної пошти.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable placeholders {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} are not consistently formatted throughout the translation. While they are present, ensuring consistent capitalization and punctuation (if any) is crucial for proper rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and maintain consistent formatting for the placeholders {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} across the entire translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tô sáng bằng màu xanh lá cây' translates to 'highlighted in green'. While understandable, a more natural and fluent translation might be 'được làm nổi bật bằng màu xanh lá cây'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'tô sáng bằng màu xanh lá cây' with 'được làm nổi bật bằng màu xanh lá cây' for improved fluency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of each sentence. While grammatically correct, the English original uses a period only at the very end of the paragraph. Maintaining consistency with the original format is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the periods at the end of each sentence to match the original English format.
